com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene

Class SceneNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene.SceneNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bone

    public class SceneNode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the positioning of one or multiple scene objects.
    Author:
    Sascha

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SceneNode()
      Creates a SceneNode with default position (0,0,0)
      SceneNode(Vector3 pos)
      Creates a SceneNode at the passed position

      • updateAll

        public void updateAll(Vector3 parentPos,
             Quaternion parentRot,
             Vector3 parentScale,
             float[] parentTransform)
        Updates the model matrix. There was an update in a parent node, therefore all children need to be informed and update their matrices accordingly.

        Get the model matrix for all children
